cardApresentation:
- Welcome to my personal website, here you will find my private universe, you will get to know me and see what I have worked and am working on. 
 You will also see what I studied and am studying! All this to be able to be comfortable if you want to hire me or partner!
apresentation:
-Hello Welcome to my personal website! My name is Lucas, I'm 21 years old and I love technology! 
 -Since I was a child I wanted to know how things in technology work, how apps, websites and games are made, and here I am now, with the first website that I created myself in search of evolving more and more.
jump_to_portfolio:
If you want to know some Works I've done, just click on the button below ⬇ 
 If you want to know a little more about me, just scroll down a little further
more_about_me:
-As you already know, my name is Lucas, and you already know that I am passionate about Technology. Information Technology is a very big world and if I could I would learn every possible area in IT! I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Information Security and robotics which I am also fascinated with, Hardware issues I am also very interested in. But I know that I have to be down to earth and specialize in one area or even two who knows, lol. 
 -Now I'm focusing on learning how to develop cross-platform apps, but before that I was studying information security, I learned a lot of basic things about it, and I think every programmer at least had to understand the basics of information security to be able to program apps safer for their users, but that's another conversation. Going forward I want to specialize in security for mobile applications and android systems, these are my plans for now.
desc_video_1:
- A personal project of mine, where I'm slowly making a Football Coach Simulator game ⚽. 
 - Why am I doing it little by little? I'm doing it little by little because I still have a lot to learn, and as I learn, more things I add to the game. At the moment I'm doing it 'alone' which makes the process slower, I put it alone in quotes because I'm getting help from a friend I met and when I can't solve a code problem he gives me strength, and with that I'm learning each again, so when I say I'm doing it alone it's because I still don't have a team putting ideas and code together with me. 
 - If you want to know more about the Project, just click on the 'FootBall Manager' button above.
desc_video_2: - A project made together with the professor of a course I took, serves as a portfolio for me to show the things I learned doing this project, the code is not 100% the same as the professor's because I changed a few things, but for sure I'm going to make a shop 2.0 later with a code 100% mine, if you want to know more about this project and know what I learned doing it just click on the button above written 'Shop App'
course_info:
COURSE WHICH THIS APP WAS DEVELOPED: 
 This application was developed together with Professor Leonardo from Cod3r, a programming course platform, I followed his recorded classes and developed the application together with him. It wasn't just this app that I developed in the course, but this one was the most complete, as it was the penultimate app of the course where it covered more things, and putting together all the things that had already been taught in the simplest apps at the beginning. the course lasts 54 hours but of course studying, and coding along with it and solving challenges, i was studying rough even 135 hours. I know this because I write down all my study/work time on this site.
